茙字的基本解释

茙
róng
〔茙葵〕即“蜀葵”，一种花草，根和花可入药。

茙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róng］
［《廣韻》如融切，平東，日。］
见“茙葵”。

茙字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　茙； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1027第25
【唐韻】如融切【集韻】而融切，?音戎。茙葵也。【述異記】茙葵，本胡中葵，似葵而大者。　又茙菽。【列子·力命篇】進其茙菽，有稻粱之味。　又【韻會】茙茙，厚貌。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】河南官氏志，茙眷氏攺爲茙氏。　又通穠。【詩·召南】何彼穠矣。《韓詩》作茙。

茙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
茙字的起名意思

蜀葵，一种花草，根和花可入药。

茙
Basic explanation of words
茙
róng
〔Honey Kwai〕 means "hollyhock", a kind of flowers, roots and flowers can be used as medicine.
茙

[①]［róng］
["Guangyun" such as fusion, Pingdong, Japan. ]
See "Plumberry".
茙
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　茙; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1027 to 25
[Tang Yun] As Rongqie 【Jiyun】 and Rongqie,? Yinrong. Populus is also. 【Su Yi Ji】The Kui Kui, this Hu Zhongkui, which resembles a sunflower but is bigger.　 and 茙菽. 【Liezi·Liming Chapter】Into its sesame seeds, it has the flavor of rice and beams.　[Rhyme Club] Ming Ming, thick-looking.　Another last name. 【General History·Clan Profile】Henan Guan's chronicles, Mingjuan's family is called Ming's family.　Tong Yi again. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】He Bijing. "Han Poetry" is made of Ming.
